abstract: michigan state vs cleveland state live stream : how to watch online .
article: friday night 's michigan state vs cleveland state game should be lopsided , but here 's how you can watch all the action online . michigan state has been red-hot this season outside of a loss to duke , but the spartans still have plenty of work to do . if you talk to tom izzo , he 'd tell you that he 's far from pleased with his team 's play through the first two months of action and says that rebounding , turnovers and defending the 3-point line need to improve . must msu basketball : 5 bold predictions vs. cleveland statethe spartans will take on cleveland state on friday night with a chance to improve to 13-1 with just one additional non-conference contest remaining -- taking place on sunday .

michigan state should take down a poor rebounding , and offensive , team in cleveland state at breslin center , but letdowns can happen after holiday breaks . miles bridges and josh langford need to prove themselves as more consistent scorers and nick ward and jaren jackson jr. . need to trust that cassius winston will get them the ball . cleveland state likes to drive to the rim , so expect michigan state 's bigs to step up and swat any would-be scorers at the bucket . here 's how you can watch friday night 's michigan state vs. cleveland state game : date : friday , dec. .
